author: ShadyTidus
install_msg:
Thanks for installing ShadyTime!

Use `/zedtime` to check the current in-game day, time, and blood moon countdown on the PA 7DTD server.
name: ShadyTime
short: 7 Days to Die server time and blood moon countdown
description: Queries the Parental Advisory 7 Days to Die server via Steam A2S protocol and reports the current in-game day, hour, minute, player count, and days until the next blood moon. Anyone can use it, with a 1-hour per-user rate limit. Results post to the configured channel.
end_user_data_statement: This cog temporarily stores the timestamp of the last command use per user for rate limiting. This data is held in memory only and is not persisted to disk.
